Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Ca' Dei Conti in Venice (Castello), you'll be minutes from Galleria Stampalia and St. Mark's Basilica. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Palazzo Querini Stampalia and Le Zitelle.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 36 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge) and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space, meeting rooms, and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge) and babysitting/childcare.
Make yourself at home in one of the 36 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds.

With a stay at Ca' Dei Conti in Venice (Castello), you'll be minutes from Galleria Stampalia and St. Mark's Basilica. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Palazzo Querini Stampalia and Le Zitelle.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Galleria Stampalia - 0.1 km / 0 mi
Palazzo Querini Stampalia - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Le Zitelle - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Church of San Zaccaria - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
St. Mark's Basilica - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Bridge of Sighs - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
St Mark's Campanile - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Procuratie Vecchie - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
St. Mark's Clocktower - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
San Zaccaria Waterbus - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Doge's Palace - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
National Library of St Mark's - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
St. Mark's Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Church of Ospedaletto - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Piccolo Teatro Delle Melodie Veneziane - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi

The preferred airport for Ca' Dei Conti is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Ca' Dei Conti is Venice (VCE-Marco Polo) - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Message.Text:
CHILDREN POLICY: KIDS FROM 0 TO 3 YEARS CAN STAY FOR FREE IN THE ROOM WITH TWOADULTS. FROM 4 TO 12 YEARS THE PRICE IS 50% OFF FROM THE STANDARD PRICE OF AN EXTRA PERSON. BABYCOT ARE AVAILABLE ON REQUEST AND THEY HAVE A COST OF 30 EUROPER NIGHT/ POLITICA NI¥OS: 0 - 3 A¥OS ESTANCIA GRATUITA. 4 - 12 50% OFF PRECIO DE UNA PERSONA EXTRA. CUNAS SON DISPONIBLES BAJO PETICION Y COSTAN 30 EUROS POR NOCHE/ POLITICA BAMBINI: 0-3 ANNI SOGGIORNO GRATUITO. 4-12 ANNI 50% OFF SUL PREZZO DIUNA PERSONA EXTRA. CULLE DISPONIBILI SU RICHIESTA E CON UN COSTO DI 30 EURO A NOTTE.

THE HOTEL INFORMS THAT CANAL VIEW HAS AN EXTRA COST OF 30 EURO PER NIGHT AND IT IS ON REQUEST/ EL HOTEL INFORMA QUE LAS HABITACIONES CON VISTA AL CANAL TIENEN UN EXTRA COSTEDE 30 EUROS POR NOCHE. BAJO PETICION/ L'HOTEL INFORMA CHE LE STANZE CON VISTA AL CANALE HANNO UN EXTRA COSTO DI 30 EURO, SU RICHIESTA/

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.
